name: Castle Hallway
description:
Description:

(This game was made for Ludum Dare 47 in 72 Hours)

Castle Hallway, a game where you have 1 minute to live, and during that time you need to find ways to get to the end without letting a temporal curse kill you.

How to play:

Swipe left and right to make choices and reach the antidote to your curse.

Inspiration

The game was based and inspired by the mechanics of Reigns and Minit.

Team

Game design: Gi Lazarini,  Daphne Trevelin;

Game Art:  Daphne Trevelin, Gi Lazarini;

HUD: Gi Lazarini,  ArkuBeats

Music and SFX: ArkuBeats;

Scripts: Gabriel Kühn Shimabukuro.

Thank You!
